com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes
Class Layout

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appinventor.client.widgets.boxes.Layout
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColumnLayout
public abstract class Layout
extends Object

Superclass of layouts for boxes on a work area panel.
